**Example 1: 示例**



Input: 

```
tccli cwp DescribeBashEventsInfo --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Id 12
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "BashEventsInfo": {
            "Uuid": "xx",
            "RegexBashCmd": "xx",
            "Platform": 1,
            "Id": 1,
            "Status": 1,
            "MachineWanIp": "xx",
            "Tags": [
                "xx"
            ],
            "MachineName": "xx",
            "RuleLevel": 1,
            "SuggestScheme": "xx",
            "Exe": "xx",
            "HostIp": "xx",
            "ModifyTime": "xx",
            "BashCmd": "xx",
            "RuleCategory": 1,
            "RuleId": 1,
            "HarmDescribe": "xx",
            "References": [
                "xx"
            ],
            "Quuid": "xx",
            "RuleName": "xx",
            "MachineStatus": "xx",
            "CreateTime": "xx",
            "PsTree": "xx"
        },
        "RequestId": "f14ce73f-50d7-4c36-af1d-fc33dae510c4"
    }
}
```
